inscription:
Signature, Edition, Inscription

Verso, stamped in silver ink: [ARTIST / PROOF / 1/10]
Verso, printed on brass plate: [COPYRIGHT RED GROOMS, 1979 / PUBLISHED BY BROOKE ALEXANDER, INC. / MARLBOROUGH GRAPHICS, INC. / PRODUCED AT VERMILLION EDITIONS, LTD.]
medium: Mixed media multiple consisting of pochoir, screenprint, rubber stamps, and hand-painting on wood, cut out and glued; with collage (chopsticks).
provenance: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1983.
signed: Signed UL, in red tempera paint: [Red Grooms]
title: Peking Delight
